hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that Mido is easily confused by sick flips.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.
